snippet: The company’s revenue and earnings soared, exceeding analysts’ estimates.
abstract: Linkedin reports fourth-quarter earnings of $11.5 million, or 10 cents a share, up from $6.9 million, or 6 cents a share in year-ago period; shares surge 9.15 percent to $135.45 on news; revenue soared 81 percent from previous year to $304 million.
lead_paragraph: The company’s revenue and earnings soared, exceeding analysts’ estimates.

headline.seo: LinkedIn’s Fourth Quarter Reinforces Its Strengths
